sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

<script>
	addLoadEvent( function() {
 		onLoadFunction();
	});
</script>
	
<input type="hidden" name="flag" id="request" value="ac3a69201b075c10d1807b46464bcb36"/>
	
<g:evaluate object="true"  var="jvar_gr">
	var jobs = new GlideRecord('x_snc_coe_p_audit_job');
	jobs.addQuery('sys_id','ac3a69201b075c10d1807b46464bcb36');
	jobs.query();
	jobs;
 </g:evaluate>
<j:while test="${jvar_gr.next()}">
	<input type="text" name="flag" id="user" value="${jvar_gr.getValue('job_type')}"/>
	
	
	<g:evaluate jelly="true"> 
		  var jT = "${jvar_gr.getValue('job_type')}"; 
	var existingQuery = '';
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_coe_audit_stream');
	gr.addQuery('audit_job', "ac3a69201b075c10d1807b46464bcb36");
	gr.query();
	
	while(gr.next())     
      existingQuery = 'sys_id!='+ gr.assignment_group.toString();
<!-- var jobs = new GlideRecord('x_snc_coe_p_audit_job');
	jobs.addQuery('sys_id','ac3a69201b075c10d1807b46464bcb36');
	jobs.query();
		if(jobs.next()) -->
	var Streams = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
	Streams.addEncodedQuery('parent=d9e11a6f1b3850103fa411fc2d4bcb19^' + existingQuery);
	Streams.addEncodedQuery("typeLIKE"+jT.toString());
	Streams.orderBy('name');
	Streams.query();
	
</g:evaluate>
	<j:while test="${Streams.next()}">
		
   			<option value="${Streams.sys_id}" title="${Streams.sys_id}"> ${Streams.name}</option>
   		</j:while>
</j:while>
	</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: add_pension_stream_2
